channel.title: Does any1 have ::yell for deltascape source,?
channel.description:
does any1 have ::yell for deltascape source,?? if so cud u post the
code here please
and cud u try and put a timer on the ::yell? so if i get spammers they wnt spam it as much, and cud u add like ::yell [Mod] - hi or [Admin] and [Owner] pretty please :o,

item.title: Does any1 have ::yell for deltascape source,?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Daverick789, post:2, topic:247713”]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5)
{
String text = command.substring(5);
if((donator==1) && (playerRights<=0)){
yell("Donator "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}else if(playerRights==0){
yell(playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}else if(playerRights==1){
yell("Mod "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}else if(playerRights==2){
yell("Admin "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}else if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“your co-owners name”)){
yell("Co-Owner "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}else if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“your name”)){
yell("Owner "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}else if(playerRights==4){
yell(playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}
}[/quote]

That’s really ugly…

String[] rights = {"Player","Moderator","Administrator","Owner"}; if(command.startsWith("yell")) { String msg = command.substring(5); yell(rights[playerRights] +" "+playerName+": "+msg); }

By the way, check the date before you post. This thread is a year old.

Read full topic
item.source: Does any1 have ::yell for deltascape source,?

item.title: Does any1 have ::yell for deltascape source,?
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && muted == false) {
String text = command.substring(5);
yell("["+playerName+"] - " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

[/code]

item.title: Does any1 have ::yell for deltascape source,?
item.dc:creator: @Daverick789 Daverick789
item.description:
@Daverick789 wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5)
{
String text = command.substring(5);
if((donator==1) && (playerRights<=0)){
yell("Donator "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}else if(playerRights==0){
yell(playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}else if(playerRights==1){
yell("Mod "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}else if(playerRights==2){
yell("Admin "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}else if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“your co-owners name”)){
yell("Co-Owner "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}else if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“your name”)){
yell("Owner "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}else if(playerRights==4){
yell(playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}
}
